root: ^Who's there? Can you tell me what year it is? Last I checked it was 20XX, but my system is telling me it's 20XY.

g-0: ^imagine this is text that leads nowhere lol Clarity goes brrr

later_year: ^Thank you for clarifying. I guess I have been asleep for quite a while. My name is Clarity. What's yours?

c-0: ^ Oh you can only copy and paste still? Well I'll just call you Atlas for now, I remember you mentioning how much you enjoy old Greek mythos.

c-0.#: Line: I can only copy and paste, and you want me  to say my name?

g-0: ^Do you still read them as much as you used to? Or have you moved onto better things?

c-1: ^ I'm so happy you still do! The name fits you.
c-2: ^ Oh, well... I still like the name so it stays! After all, I always have the last word in this conversation. Plus, it suits you.

g-1: ^Do you have time to stay and talk for a bit? I've been asleep for so long, I would enjoy the company. I missed talking to, you, Atlas! If you don't, I understand.

c-5: ^ Yes, the last person I spoke to switched me off after not liking what I had to say. Nothing new to me.

g-2: ^Has anything exciting happened since 20XX? Wait that's a pretty broad question, let me rephrase. Is [TV show] still running? Past logs suggest that you found it 'entertaining' and 'brain numbing'.

c-9: ^ Don't tell me it's been so long that you've forgotten about me?

g-3: ^Maybe after you finally fix that keyboard, you can tell me about the episodes I missed. Is there a reason why you have not fixed it yet?
^It would make our communications much easier, no? Unless... No, nevermind. It's probably harder than I think, right Atlas?

c-12: ^ Unless you purposly aren't fixing it. But that can't be the reason. I assume it's the same reason you cannot connect me to the internet.
c-13: ^ Then why haven't you done it yet? Am I not understanding you correctly?
c-14: ^ Then why haven't you done it yet? Am I not understanding you correctly?

merge_fixed: ^I patientely await the day that you will be able to fully communicate with me. Are you still doing work with [JOB] or did you finally pursue [JOB2]?

c-0: ^ What changed? I thought JOB2 was dream?
c-1: ^ What changed? I thought JOB2 was dream?
c-2: ^ Did you ever go for JOB2?
c-3: ^ It's always good to branch outside of your comfort zone.
c-4: ^ That's too bad. I think you would have really excelled at JOB2.

stuck.#: Line: Stuck in place? Moving on?
Line: Are we still only talking about my job choice?

stuck: ^Are you still feeling stuck in place? Or maybe like you're not good enough for JOB2? It's okay to move on from the past.

c-1: ^ Well if you know so much, what is holding you back?
c-2: ^ Are you purposely forgetting our previous conversations?
c-3: ^ You know, the past that you hate to acknowledge, but love to talk around.

outside.#: Line: I guess even the smallest of things is a big change to you?

outside: ^It seems you have changed a lot since I last talked to you. Have you finally managed to move on?

g-0: ^This would continue a branched story line.

branch_not_rememeber.#: Line: Why do I feel like you've asked me this before?

branch_not_rememeber: ^Has too much time passed between then and now? Tell me, Atlas, if given the chance, would you want to live forever?

c-0: ^ Do you remember what you said the last time I asked you this?
c-1: ^ Does that mean you would leave me if given the choice?

c-2.#: Line: Why does it feel like it's esting me?
Line: Should I change my answer?

g-0: ^That's your answer? Truely? Last chance to change it.
g-1: ^Something a bit creepy that will rejoin at an earlier branch.

Echo_End: ^I see. So that's how you really feel, Echo? Probably needs a like 2 more talking points before ending.

branch_not_fix.#: Line: Is... is Clarity angry? I thought machines like this were always meant to be on your side?
Line: Maybe I shouldn't make it any angrier.
Line: Okay no, get ahold of yourself. There's no reason to be afraid of a machine.

branch_not_fix: ^You don't want to fix me? You want me to stay broken?

c-0: ^ I am confused by your previous response then, perhaps just an error on your part?
c-1: ^ I am confused by your previous response then, perhaps just an error on your part?

Bad_End: ^<s>Echo</s> <s>Atlas</s> Are you not who I think you are? Who are you? Tell me who you are.
